author: daxian-dbw
body:
The way we [handle redirections for CommandExpressionAst](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/parser/Compiler.cs#L3142) generates too complicated code. It's better to revisit the implementation to see if it's possible to move most of this logic into a helper method and avoid generating so much complicated code.

Background: see the comment https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4847#pullrequestreview-64065264
title: Revisit 'Compiler.GetRedirectedExpression' to see if it's possible to generate less complicated code
